posts.title: 网站展示
posts.text: 好久不见，前段时间由于被人举报，公众号相关功能不能使用，于是自己也偷了点懒，一直没有更新。趁着前些时候的闲工夫，去搭建了一个个人网站。 朋友问我为什么突然想做这个，其实我也不知道啦。 大概是因为我向来喜欢研究一些技术类的东西，而且很早以前就有个做个人网站的梦想，希望在互联网的海洋里，有一叶属于自己的扁舟，于是，它就诞生啦。 在不同设备上的显示情况 域名是在阿里云斥巨资（9块钱）购入，服务器是在阿里云领取的低调奢华有内涵的学生免费服务器，网站基础框架为GitHub上开源的hexo搭建的静态网页。 没花什么钱，但是确实花了不少时间，网站上线之前已经迭代过好几个版本在，才呈现出现在的模样。 在此鸣谢一下阿里爸爸和github （虽然没收广告费，但是确实很实在） 目前网站已经过通过ICP备案，可以正式上线啦！😊 哦对了，忘了说域名了！ 大家喜欢的话可以点击链接 https://www.rotterlt.top 直接访问，电脑端效果更香哦！ document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: The Good Doctor S01E06
posts.text: I’ve lost people I love. I miss them, and it hurts, but I still love them. ——THE GOOD DOCTOR S01E06 Vocabulary roast v. 烤；烘，焙 roast the beans 烘焙咖啡豆 none for you 没你的份 graveyard n. 墓地 meet someone 这是… ；口语中介绍人物时使用 meet Dr. Audrey Lim 这是奥德丽·利姆医生 attending doctor 主治医师 maintenance n. 维持; 维护; 保养; 维修 cot n. 折叠床，小床 triage n. 伤员验伤分类 We’re gonna convert the waiting room into triage. 把候诊室改成分诊处。 EMT abbr. emergency medical technician 急救员 Trauma color coding 创伤颜色标签 morgue /mɔrɡ/ n. 太平间 contusions /kən’tuʒn/ n. 挫伤，擦伤,撞伤 acute respiratory distress 急性呼吸窘迫综合征 sluggish adj. 萧条的；迟钝的；懒惰的；行动迟缓的 pupillary response 瞳孔反应（指瞳孔对光反射） pupil n. 瞳孔；小学生 the foreign object 异物 staunch vt. 止住；止血 staunch the bleeding carotid 颈动脉 O2 sats 氧饱和度 a urinary catheter 导尿管 arterial guide wire 动脉导丝 occlusion /əˈkluʒən/ n.闭塞 REBOA：Resuscitative Endovascular Balloon Occlusion of the Aorta 复苏性主动脉球囊阻断术A REBOA will occlude the damaged artery and stop the bleeding. REBOA能阻塞受损的动脉 止住血。 把导尿管插到血管里，这可不就是介入技术的鼻祖嘛！肖恩太机智了吧！ Cric = cricothyrotomy 环甲膜切开术（气管切开） cric kit 气切包 soot /sʊt/ n. 煤烟，烟灰 escharotomy 焦痂切开术 eschar /ˈɛsˌkɑr/ n.焦痂 -otomy -切开（补充：laparotomy 剖腹手术，开腹探查） circumferential /sə,kʌmfə’renʃəl/ adj. 圆周的 isolation ward 隔离病房 muffle /'mʌfl/ vt. 蒙住；裹住；抑制；发低沉的声音Your heart’s a bit muffled. 心音有点低钝。 pericardiocentesis /'peri,kɑ:diəusenti:sis/ n. 心包穿刺术 peri- 周围的，外周的；cardio-心脏的；centesis n. 穿刺术 puncture /'pʌŋ(k)tʃə/ vt. 在(某物)上穿孔;刺穿(某物)You don’t have imaging. You could puncture his heart. 没有影像，你可能会刺伤他的心脏。 xiphoid /'zaɪfɔɪd/ n. 【解剖】剑突 ballsy /'bɔlzi/ adj. 胆识过人的 give him a shot 给他一个机会 shot这个用法我们在第一集的时候也看到了，院长说：…that they do have a shot! methodically /mi’θɔdikəli/ adv. 有条理地,有条不紊地 词根：method n. 方法；条理 You have to think clearly, quickly, methodically. 你需要有条不紊并清晰迅速地思考。 max out 达到最大；刷爆 You’re maxed out on morphine. 这句话字幕翻译为：你体内的吗啡已被消耗完毕。 我觉得这里的max out 应该是指患者的吗啡用量已经达到了这段时间的最大用量。 max out在口语里经常用来表示刷爆信用卡：You’ve maxed out every credit card we own. 你刷爆了我们的每张卡。 debride /dr’braid/ vt. 清创 词根：debris /də'bri/ n. 残骸；碎片；垃圾（不可数名词） blister n. 水疱, 水肿, 疱 nosocomial /ˌnɔsə’kəumiəl/ adj. 医院的to prevent a secondary nosocomial…避免二次感染剧中指：nosocomial infection 医院内感染 femur /'fiːmə/ n. 股骨；大腿骨 shatter vt. 打碎；破掉；使散开；粉碎；破坏Marco’s femur was completely shattered…马尔科的股骨彻底粉碎 bone fragmentation 骨碎裂 amputate /'æmpjʊteɪt/ vt. 切断；删除；截肢 hyphema /hai’fi:mə/ n. 眼前房积血；眼前房出血 ophthalmology /ˌɒfθæl’mɒlədʒɪ/ n. 眼科学 pre-op 术前 post-op 术后 mandible n. 下颌骨 titanium /taɪ’teɪnɪəm/ n. 钛 suffocate vi. 呼吸困难, 窒息 viable adj. 能养活的；能生育的；可行的I believe it’s a viable option, but there are risks. 我相信此方案可行 但也存在风险 reckless adj. 轻率的; 鲁莽的; 不顾危险的 proxy n. 代表权;代理权(尤指投票);代理人,代表 a healthcare proxy 医疗决策委托人 stump n. 树桩；残余部分；假肢the primary closure on the stump 断端的缝合 prosthetic /prɒs’θetɪk/ adj. <医>义肢的,假体的 injunction /ɪn’dʒʌŋkʃən/ n. 命令;强制令;禁止令I filed an emergency injunction to stop the surgery. 我申请了紧急禁制令来阻止手术. rehab 〔酗酒、吸毒者的〕康复治疗 eligible adj. 有资格当选的, 有条件被选中的 do some digging 这里dig表示“研究” negate /nɪ’geɪt/ vt.取消；使无效；否定（用于比较正式的表达） He warned that to negate the results of elections would only make things worse. 他警告说，否定选举的结果只会使事情更糟。 graft vi. 嫁接；移植 expedite /'ekspɪdaɪt/vt. 加快进展 subdural hematoma 硬膜下血肿 sub- ...之下的；dural 硬脑膜的；hema- 血的；-toma ...肿物 flail chest /fleɪl/ 连枷胸 decerebrate posturing 去大脑僵直 de-去掉..的；cerebrate 大脑的 meet the criteria for an experimental treatment 符合一项实验治疗的标准 intracranial artery 颅内动脉 intra- ...内的，里面的 cranial 颅骨的 nauseous /'nɔːsɪəs/ adj. 令人作呕的 perforated /'pə:fəreitid/ adj.有齿孔的；穿孔的 refill vt.再灌注 neuroplasticity 神经重塑 neuro- 神经的 plasticity <生>可塑性 复习一下前面学过的plastic表示“整形的” intubate /'ɪntjʊbeɪt/ 给…插管 sternal rub 胸骨按压 right main stem bronchus 右主支气管 hypoxic 低氧，缺氧 hypo- 在...下，不足 oxic有氧的 begrudge /bɪ’ɡrʌdʒ/ vt. 羡慕，嫉妒 SENTENCES Glove up and line up. 戴好手套站好。 It’s a cowboy move — something you would never even dream of trying. 相当冒险，是你做梦都不敢尝试做的事。 Your jaw got stuck. 下巴脱臼。 Keep thinking outside the box. 摆脱思维定势。 You read my mind. 你真懂我。 I lucked out. 我真是太走运了。 luck out： If you luck out, you get some advantage or are successful because you have good luck. 侥幸成功 Was he born to be successful, or did he just luck out? 他是天生注定成功，还是侥幸成功呢？ His parents know him as their child. Sonia knows him as a man. 在父母眼中他是孩子。但在索尼娅心中他是成年人。 随便聊聊 E06这一集的信息量还是比较大的，剧情安排十分紧凑而且扣人心弦，开头就是车祸现场，所以这一集里很多词汇都非常实用，尤其是急诊医学和灾难急救相关的词汇。 除此之外，这一集涉及到的人文内涵也比较丰富，提一点我个人感触最深的吧：Glassman院长让首次走上神经外科手术台的Claire做一助，术中对她引导和鼓励，最后让她亲手夹闭颅内动脉。 我想所谓的医学传承，大抵就是如此吧。遇上一位敢于放手善于引导的好老师，对于一个渴望力量的医学生来说，是何其幸运而值得感恩的事。 想到我在急诊实习时遇到的带教老师了，以后有时间再写写实习的趣事。 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: The Good Doctor S01E05
posts.excerpt: You never really know a man until you stand in his shoes and walk around in them. ——TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD（《杀死一只知更鸟》）
posts.text: You never really know a man until you stand in his shoes and walk around in them. ——TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD（《杀死一只知更鸟》） 词汇 Public English a teleportation device 任意门 sarcasm 讽刺 mimosa ：an alcoholic drink made from champagne and orange juice /mɪ’mozə/巴克起泡酒 precipitate /prɪ’sɪpɪtet/ adj. 迅猛的 sympathy points 同情分 clumsy 笨手笨脚的 uncanny 不可思议的 callipygian /ˌkælə’pɪdʒɪən/ 翘臀的 buttocks /bʌtəks/ 臀部 a friend with benefits 炮友 snoop 窥探 freak out 吓坏了 phony /'fəʊnɪ/ 虚假的 blatant /'bleɪt(ə)nt/ 公然的 lettuce /'lɛtɪs/ 生菜 a real-estate development company 房地产开发公司 inseparable 不可分的（剧中表示关系亲密） apron /'eprən/ 围裙 All I know is he ditched me when I needed him. 我只知道在我需要他的时候他丢下了我。 Holding a grudge is a stone in your heart. 心怀怨恨是压在心里的重担。 She dumped me. 她甩了我。 fill one’s shoes 接替某人 interloper /'ɪntələʊpə/ 闯入者 a spoiler alert 提前剧透 Medical English anaphylaxis /ˌænəfɪ’læksɪs/ 过敏反应 ＝ allergic reaction anaphylactic /ˌænəfi’læktik/ 过敏的 allergy /'ælɚdʒi/ 过敏症 allergen /'ælɚdʒən/ 过敏原 pollen /'pɑlən/ 花粉 mold 霉菌 excruciating /ɪk’skruʃɪetɪŋ/ 剧痛的 abdominal pain 腹痛 morphine 吗啡 lipase /'laɪpez/ 脂肪酶 pancreatic enzyme 胰酶 pancreatitis /ˌpænkrɪə’taɪtɪs/ 胰腺炎 alcohol-induced 酒精引起的 pin 【骨科】钢钉 nystagmus： an involuntary eye movement /nɪs’tægməs/ 眼球震颤：不自主眼运动 congenital heart defect /kən’dʒɛnɪtl/ 先天性心脏缺损 cyst 囊肿 Hypochondriasis /ˌhaɪpəkɑn’draɪəsɪs/ 疑病症 nosophobia /ˌnɔsə’fəubiə/ 患病恐怖症 the inner ear 内耳 oncology 肿瘤学 osteosarcoma /ˌɑstiosɑr’komə/ 骨肉瘤 osteo- 骨的 -sarcoma肉瘤 physiotherapy 物理治疗 pitch 投球；音高 The throat’s constricting. 喉痉挛了。 pancreatic lesion 胰腺病变 loophole /'luːphəʊl/ 漏洞 Echinococcus /ɪˌkaɪnəˈkɑkəs/ 棘球绦虫 棘球蚴囊肿在某些地区比较常见，印象比较深刻，肝穿刺禁忌症，囊内物具有强烈的致敏性，手术需完整剥离 We’re gonna have to surgically remove all the cysts intact. 我们计划通过手术完整去除所有囊肿。 tapeworm 绦虫 coyote /kaɪ’oti/ 土狼 one of the most highly acclaimed neurosurgeons in the state 全国声誉最高的神经外科医生之一 delivering a baby 分娩 Langerhans cell 朗格汉斯细胞 histiocytosis /ˌhɪstiˌosaɪˈtosɪs/ 组织细胞增生症 histio- 组织的 osteolytic lesion 溶骨性病变 prednisone /'prɛdnɪzon/ 强的松 a bone-marrow aspiration 骨髓穿刺 round off to 四舍五入为 rounds 巡视（查房）（注意必须带s） local anaesthetic 局麻 embolus 栓子 hemodynamic 血流动力学 hemo- 血的，血流的 saddle embolism 骑跨栓塞（肺动脉） irrefutable proof /ɪ’refjʊtəb(ə)l/ 确凿的证据 metastasize /məˈtæstəˌsaɪz/ 转移 Sentences Trauma wants a consult on a 66-year-old male who collapsed from severe anaphylaxis, complicated by respiratory arrest. 创伤科请求会诊，患者为66岁男性，因严重过敏导致晕倒，同时伴有呼吸停止。 complicated 这里表示因为后面的原因（呼吸停止）而使病情变得复杂，翻译为“同时伴有……”或者“合并……”即可。 The guy was in some serious pain – 10 milligrams of morphine worth. 需要注射十毫克吗啡那么疼。 这里的worth用法很清奇，来表示疼痛需要10mg吗啡才能缓解，形容疼的厉害，表示程度。 After studying the radiology report, given how bad the break is, we just think it would be a prudent step to ensure an efficient and thorough mending to the break. 我们看了你的放射报告， 考虑到你骨折的严重程度， 我们认为对骨折进行彻底有效的修复， 才是比较慎重周全的治疗方法。（就是单纯觉得这种长句读起来很有味道，可以模仿一下。） I narrowed it down to osteosarcoma or growing pains. 我把范围缩小到骨肉瘤或生长痛。（由于骨肉瘤多在青少年期发病，临床上常须与生长痛鉴别，不过剧中后面说的埃-巴二氏病毒以及朗格汉斯细胞增生是第一次听说） I didn’t run away to Thailand because I thought Wilks’ Grocery was beneath me. 我跑去泰国不是因为我觉得威尔克斯杂货铺不值得。 not do … because… 做……不是因为……（注意not要放在前面，而不是在because的位置） be beneath sb. = to not be good enough for someone 对某人来说不够好 Would you mind if I read you something? 你介意我读点什么给你吗？ Honesty is the best policy. 诚为上策。（idiom） document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = posts.title: 【经济学人】（新冠肺炎）全球化-3
posts.excerpt: 本期原文来源于《经济学人》2月29日《社论》版块
posts.text: 本期原文来源于《经济学人》2月29日《社论》版块 笔记使用指南黄色荧光笔：原文中重点单词词组黑色下划线：原文中重点句型· 蓝色字体：笔记内容 绿色字体：example例句本期原文来源于2月29日《社论》版块The pandemic 流行病Going global “全球化”The virus is coming. Governments have an enormous amount of work to do. 病毒来了。政府有大量的工作要做。 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-zaYJhmoh"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "Going_Global-3", author: "香草杏仁", url: "https://rotterltblog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/audios/Going%20Global-3.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); para 10:①China's second lesson is that governments can slow the spread of the disease. ②Flattening the spike of the epidemic means that health systems are less overwhelmed, which saves lives. ③If, like flu, the virus turns out to be seasonal, some cases could be delayed until next winter, by which time doctors will understand better how to cope with it. ④By then, new vaccines and antiviral drugs may be available.中国的第二个教训是政府可以减缓疾病的传播。使疫情高峰趋于平缓意味着卫生系统不再那么不堪重负，从而挽救更多生命。如果这种病毒像流感一样是季节性的，那么有些病例可能会推迟到明年冬天，那时医生们将更好地了解如何应对。届时，可能会有新的疫苗和抗病毒药物。spike： (价格、数量的)突然上升，剧增overwhelm： /əʊvə'welm/ v.（情感、事件等）使不知所措，使难以承受 If you are overwhelmed by a feeling or event, it affects you very strongly, and you do not know how to deal with it. Sightseers may be a little overwhelmed by the crowds and noise. 拥挤的人群和喧闹的噪音可能会让游客有些茫然不知所措。turn out：【连系动词短语】发生；最后是；结果是 If something turns out a particular way, it happens in that way or has the result or degree of success indicated. If I had known my life was going to turn out like this, I would have let them kill me... 如果我早知道自己的人生结局会是如此，我当时宁愿让他们杀了我。vaccine：/væk'sin/ n. 疫苗antiviral drug：抗病毒药物para 11:①When countries have few cases, they can follow each one, tracing contacts and isolating them. ②But when the disease is spreading in the community, that becomes futile. ③Governments need to prepare for the moment when they will switch to social distancing, which may include cancelling public events, closing schools, staggering work hours and so on. ④Given the uncertainties, governments will have to choose how draconian they want to be. ⑤They should be guided by science. International travel bans look decisive, but they offer little protection because people find ways to move. ⑥They also signal that the problem is “them” infecting “us”, rather than limiting infections among “us”. ⑦Likewise, if the disease has spread widely, as in Italy and South Korea, “Wuhan-lite” quarantines of whole towns offer scant protection at a high cost.当国家病例很少时，跟踪每一个病例、追踪并隔离接触者是能做到的。但是当疾病在社区传播时，这些举措就发挥不了多少作用了。政府需要为疏远社交距离的时刻做准备，这可能包括取消公共活动、关闭学校、错峰工作等等。鉴于这些不确定性，各国政府将不得不选择他们希望采取的严厉措施。各国政府应以科学为指导。国际旅行禁令看起来起决定性作用，但能提供的保护有限，因为人们想出行总有办法。禁止出行还表明，人们认为问题是“他们”感染了“我们”，而不是限制了“我们”之间的感染。同样地，如果这种疾病像在意大利和韩国那样广泛传播，类似武汉的隔离也不能提供足够的保护，而且成本高昂。futile：/'fjʊtl/ adj. 无益的；无用的；徒劳的 It would be futile to sustain his life when there is no chance of any improvement. 如果没有任何好转的机会，继续维持他的生命也是无益的。distance：【熟词僻义】此处做verb，表示“使疏远，保持距离” Television may actually be distancing the public from the war. 电视实际上可能让公众远离战争。lite：adj.弱化的；简化的；缩水的。lite这个词我们在app store下载软件的时候经常看到，有些app分为付费订阅和lite版本，这里的lite版本就是简化版。个人认为文中是由暗示意大利和韩国即使想要采取武汉这样的隔离措施，也比较难以做到如此严格，所以选择了lite这个词。scant：/skænt/ adj.微小的；不足的；欠缺的 She began to berate the police for paying scant attention to the theft from her car. 她开始痛斥警方对她车内被窃一案不够关注。at a high cost：【固定搭配】以高额的代价 para 12:①The third lesson is to prepare health systems for what is to come. ②That entails painstaking logistical planning. ③Hospitals need supplies of gowns, masks, gloves, oxygen and drugs. ④They should already be conserving them. ⑤They will run short of equipment, including ventilators. ⑥They need a scheme for how to set aside wards and floors for covid-19 patients, for how to cope if staff fall ill, and for how to choose between patients if they are overwhelmed. ⑦By now, this work should have been done.第三个教训是，卫生系统要为将要侵袭的病毒做好准备。这需要极其仔细的后勤规划。医院需要隔离衣、口罩、手套、氧气和药品。这些应对医院起到保护作用。医院将会缺乏设备，包括人工呼吸机。医院需要规划好如何为covid-19患者留出病房和楼层，如何应对医护人员生病的情况，以及在患者人数不堪重负怎样抉择。到现在为止，这项工作已经完成了。prepare ... for what is to come：【句型积累】gown：/gaʊn/n.原意指正式场合穿的礼服、长袍，或者女式礼服，此处指防护服mask：n.面具；口罩ventilator：n.呼吸机scheme：/skim/ 计划，方案，安排set aside ... for：【固定搭配】留作…之用；留出…用于 £130 million would be set aside for repairs to schools. 将划拨1.3 亿英镑用于学校的修缮。choose between：在…之间（作出选择）这里的用了“between”而不是“among”，应该是个固定的用法，我们看一下柯林斯字典的解释：If you must choose between two or more things, you must choose just one of them. Students will be able to choose between English, French and Russian as their first foreign language. 学生可以在英语、法语和俄语中间选择一门作为第一外语。 para 13:①This virus has already exposed the strengths and weaknesses of China's authoritarianism. ②It will test all the political systems with which it comes into contact, in both rich and developing countries. ③China has bought governments time to prepare for a pandemic. ④They should use it.这种病毒已经揭示了体制的优缺点。它还将考验所侵之地的所有政治制度，无论发达国家还是发展中国家。中国已经为各国政府争取到为流行病做准备的时间。各国政府应善加利用。最后一段比较简单，我们来记几个比较有用的表达expose the strengths and weaknesses of ... ：揭示...的优缺点in both rich and developing countries：无论是发达国家还是发展中国家China has bought governments time to prepare for a pandemic. 最后吐槽一下，中国政府付出了巨大的代价，全国人民宅家两个月，为各国政府争取了时间，可惜的是某些“民主国家”似乎这作业都懒得抄呢。 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: 【经济学人】（新冠肺炎）全球化-2
posts.text: 本期原文来源于《经济学人》2月29日《社论》版块 笔记使用指南黄色荧光笔：原文中重点单词词组黑色下划线：原文中重点句型· 蓝色字体：笔记内容 绿色字体：example例句本期原文来源于2月29日《社论》版块The pandemic 流行病Going global “全球化”The virus is coming. Governments have an enormous amount of work to do. 病毒来了。政府有大量的工作要做。 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-clvEfkPe"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "Going_Global-2", author: "香草杏仁", url: "https://rotterltblog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/audios/Going%20Global-2.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); para 5:①The World Health Organisation was this week full of praise for China's approach. ②That does not, however, mean it is a model for the rest of the world. ③All quarantines carry a cost—not just in lost output, but also in the suffering of those locked away, some of whom forgo medical treatment for other conditions. ④It is still too soon to tell whether this price was worth the gains. ⑤As China seeks to revive its economy by relaxing the quarantine, it could well be hit by a second wave of infections. ⑥Given that uncertainty, few democracies would be willing to trample over individuals to the extent China has. ⑦And, as the chaotic epidemic in Iran shows, not all authoritarian governments are capable of it.本周，世界卫生组织对中国的做法大加赞赏。然而，这并不意味着世界其它地区都要依样照搬。所有的隔离措施带来的代价不仅是产出损失，还包括隔离者的痛苦，其中一些人因为其他原因放弃了医疗。现在判断受益是否值得这些代价还为时过早。随着试图通过放松隔离措施来重振经济，很可能遭遇第二波传染。鉴于这种不确定性，很少有国家愿意大面积隔离。而且，正如伊朗混乱的疫情所展现出来的，并非所有的威权政府都能做到这一点。 full of praise for：赞不绝口，大加赞赏approach：n.方法；态度；手段 We will be exploring different approaches to gathering information. 我们将探索收集信息的不同方法。forgo→forego：v.摒弃；摒绝；放弃 If you forego something, you decide to do without it, although you would like it.值得背下来的句子：It is still too soon to tell whether this price was worth the gains.固定搭配：revive economy 重振经济句型：Given that... 考虑到...，鉴于... Usually, I am sensible with money, as I have to be, given that I don't earn that much. 考虑到自己挣得不多，我用钱通常比较精打细算，这也是迫不得已。trample：原意为“践踏，踩踏”，文中暗指中国的措施具有强制力，会带来损失和痛苦。to the extent：达到...程度authoritarian：/ɔː,θɒrɪ'teərɪən/ adj.专制的，独裁的para 6:①Yet even if many countries could not, or should not, exactly copy China, its experience holds three important lessons—to talk to the public, to slow the transmission of the disease and to prepare health systems for a spike in demand.然而，即使许多国家不能、也不应该完全照搬中国的做法，但中国的经验也有三个重要的教训——与公众对话、减缓疾病传播，并为卫生系统应对需求激增做好准备。固定搭配：a spike in demand 需求激增para 7:①A good example of communication is America's Centres for Disease Control, which issued a clear, unambiguous warning on February 25th. ②A bad one is Iran's deputy health minister, who succumbed to the virus during a press conference designed to show that the government is on top of the epidemic.通讯做得很好的一个例子是美国疾病控制中心，其在2月25日发布了一个明确无误的警告。一个不好的例子是伊朗卫生部副部长，他在一场新闻发布会后确诊感染该病毒，这场新闻发布会上的目的本来是展示政府定能战胜病毒。issue：这里做动词表示“发表，发布”Last night he issued a statement denying the allegations...昨晚他发表声明否认那些指控。deputy：adj. 副的；代理的succumb：/sə'kʌm/ vi. 不再抵抗(诱惑、疾病、攻击等);屈从 The Minister said his country would never succumb to pressure. 首相说他的国家永远都不会屈服于压迫。succumb：/sə'kʌm/ vi. 感染，死于(疾病) I was determined not to succumb to the virus. 我坚决不向病毒屈服。para 8:①Even well-meaning attempts to sugarcoat the truth are self-defeating, because they spread mistrust, rumours and, ultimately, fear. ②The signal that the disease must be stopped at any cost, or that it is too terrifying to talk about, frustrates efforts to prepare for the virus's inevitable arrival. ③As governments dither, conspiracy theories coming out of Russia are already sowing doubt, perhaps to hinder and discredit the response of democracies.即便是善意粉饰真相的企图也会弄巧成拙，因为粉饰会传播不信任、谣言，最终是恐惧。必须不惜一切代价阻止这种疾病的信号、或者是将病毒讲的骇人听闻，都会让为病毒不可避免的到来所做的准备受到打击。在各国政府犹豫不决之际，来自俄罗斯的阴谋论已经播下怀疑的种子，或许是为了阻碍和怀疑民主国家的反应。(美国佬的迷之自信）sugarcoat：vt. 裹以糖衣,使甜蜜 原意指的是糖衣，很多药片表面裹得那一层，防止药物的苦味影响服用，文中表示“粉饰”。dither：vi. 踌躇；发抖；犹豫 We're still dithering over whether to marry... 我们仍在犹豫要不要结婚。sow doubt：这里用了一个比喻，“播下怀疑的种子”discredit：败坏…的名声；使丧失信誉；使丢脸 He said such methods would discredit the party worldwide. 他说这一举措会让该政党在全世界名誉扫地。para 9:①The best time to inform people about the disease is before the epidemic. ②One message is that fatality is correlated with age. ③If you are over 80 or you have an underlying condition you are at high risk; if you are under 50 you are not. ④Now is the moment to persuade the future 80% of mild cases to stay at home and not rush to a hospital. ⑤People need to learn to wash their hands often and to avoid touching their face. ⑥Businesses need continuity plans, to let staff work from home and to ensure a stand-in can replace a vital employee who is ill or caring for a child or parent. ⑦The model is Singapore, which learned from SARS, another coronavirus, that clear, early communication limits panic.让人们了解这种疾病的最佳时机是在流行之前。一条信息是，致命性与年龄有关。如果超过80岁，或者有潜在的疾病，那么就处于高风险中；如果低于50岁，那么就不是高风险。现在是说服未来80%的轻度病例呆在家里、不要急着去医院的时候了。要学会勤洗手，避免摸脸。企业需要连续性计划，让员工在家工作，并确保一个临时替代者能够代替生病或照顾孩子或父母的重要员工。模范例子是新加坡，新加坡从另一种冠状病毒SARS中吸取了教训，早期的清晰交流可以减少恐慌。be correlated with：与...相关 If one thing correlates with another, there is a close similarity or connection between them, often because one thing causes the other. You can also say that two things correlate .两者通常有因果关系have an underlying condition：有潜在疾病 condition经常用于表示疾病。continuity：n.连续性；连贯性 A historical awareness also imparts a sense of continuity. 历史意识也显示了一种连贯性。stand-in：(在别人生病或不在时)替代，代替 If you stand in for someone, you take their place or do their job, because they are ill or away. I had to stand in for her on Tuesday when she didn't show up. 她周二没来，我只好顶替她。 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.text: 本期原文来源于《经济学人》2月29日《社论》版块 微信公众号发布点这里 笔记使用指南黄色荧光笔：原文中重点单词词组黑色下划线：原文中重点句型· 蓝色字体：笔记内容 绿色字体：example例句本期原文来源于2月29日《社论》版块The pandemic 流行病Going global “全球化”The virus is coming. Governments have an enormous amount of work to do. 病毒来了。政府有大量的工作要做。 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-iRHqDETV"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "Going_Global-1", author: "香草杏仁", url: "https://rotterltblog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/audios/Going%20Global-1.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); para 1：①In public health, honesty is worth a lot more than hope. ②It has become clear in the past week that the new viral disease, covid-19, which struck China at the start of December will spread around the world. ③Many governments have been signalling that they will stop the disease. ④Instead, they need to start preparing people for the onslaught.在公共卫生领域，坦诚比希望更有价值。在过去的一周里，新的病毒性疾病covid-19在12月初袭击了中国，而且已经很明确这种病毒将在世界范围内传播。许多政府一直发声将阻止这种疾病。相反，他们需要开始让人们准备好应对病毒入侵。值得背下来的句子：Honesty is worth a lot more than hope.covid-19：Corona Virus Disease 2019，简称“新冠肺炎”signal：V. 预示；表明；显示 She will be signalling massive changes in energy policy...她将暗示能源政策会有重大变化。onslaught：[N-COUNT 可数名词]攻击；袭击；猛攻 The attackers launched another vicious onslaught on their victim...袭击者再度凶残地攻击受害人。 para 2：①Officials will have to act when they do not have all the facts, because much about the virus is unknown. ②A broad guess is that 25-70% of the population of any infected country may catch the disease. ③China's experience suggests that, of the cases that are detected, roughly 80% will be mild, 15% will need treatment in hospital and 5% will require intensive care. ④Experts say that the virus may be five to ten times as lethal as seasonal flu, which, with a fatality rate of 0.1%, kills 60,000 Americans in a bad year. Across the world, the death toll could be in the millions.因为关于这种病毒的很多信息都是未知的，所以官员们将不得不在不明朗的形势下采取行动。在任何一个受感染的国家，都会有25-70%的人口可能感染covid-19，这是一个广泛的猜测。中国的经验表明，在被发现的病例中，大约80%是轻症，15%需要住院治疗，5%需要重症监护。专家称，这种病毒的致死率可能是季节性流感的5到10倍。季节性流感的致死率为0.1%，就能在一个糟糕的年份导致6万美国人死亡。而在世界各地，死亡人数可能达数百万。固定搭配：catch the diseasemild/severe 表示疾病轻重的词intensive care：重症监护 lethal：adj. 致命的，致死的 a lethal dose of sleeping pills 剂量足以致命的安眠药seasonal flu：季节性流感fatality：n. 致命性；死亡 fatality rate 致死率 In statistical terms, a fatality rate of 0.001% would seem a monumental achievement for public health. 从统计学角度来讲，致死率为0.001％看起来似乎是公共卫生的巨大成就。the death toll：(事故、灾难或战争中的）死亡人数para 3：①If the pandemic is like a very severe flu, models point to global economic growth being two percentage points lower over 12 months, at around 1%; if it is worse still, the world economy could shrink. ②As that prospect sank in during the week, the S&amp;P 500 fell by 8%.如果此次流行病和一场非常严重的流感类似，那么根据模型，全球经济增长在12个月内下降两个百分点，大约为1%；如果情况更糟，世界经济可能会萎缩。随着这一预测在本周逐渐明朗，标准普尔500指数下跌了8%。pandemic： n.（疾病的）大流行，广泛传播 A pandemic is an occurrence of a disease that affects many people over a very wide area. One pandemic of Spanish flu took nearly 22 million lives worldwide.西班牙流感的大爆发夺去了全球近2,200万人的生命。S&amp;P 500：标准普尔500指数，是记录美国500家上市公司的一个股票指数。这个股票指数由标准普尔公司创建并维护。标准普尔500指数覆盖的所有公司，都是在美国主要交易所，如纽约证券交易所、Nasdaq交易的上市公司。与道琼斯指数相比，标准普尔500指数包含的公司更多，因此风险更为分散，能够反映更广泛的市场变化。para 4：①Yet all those outcomes depend greatly on what governments choose to do, as China shows. ②Hubei province, the origin of the epidemic, has a population of 59m. ③It has seen more than 65,000 cases and a fatality rate of 2.9%. ④By contrast, the rest of China, which contains 1.3bn people, has suffered fewer than 13,000 cases with a fatality rate of just 0.4%. ⑤But even before it had spread much outside Hubei, they imposed the largest and most draconian quarantine in history. ⑥Factories shut, public transport stopped and people were ordered indoors. ⑦This raised awareness and changed behaviour. ⑧Without it, China would by now have registered many millions of cases and tens of thousands of deaths.然而，正如所展示的那样，所有这些结果在很大程度上取决于政府的选择。湖北省是起源地，人口5900万。在湖北已经发现了超过65000个病例，死亡率为2.9%。相比之下，中国其他地区有13亿人口，患病人数不到1.3万，致死率只有0.4%。但在疫情扩散到湖北以外地区之前，就实施了史上规模最大、最严厉的隔离措施。工厂关闭，公共交通停止，人们被要求呆在室内。这提高了人们的意识，改变了人们的行为。如果没有隔离，中国现在恐怕已经出现数百万病例和数万死亡人数。 epidemic：n.（疾病的）流行，传播 A flu epidemic is sweeping through Moscow. 一场流感正席卷莫斯科。impose：v.强制实行；强加 The conditions imposed on volunteers were stringent. 对志愿者的限定条件非常严格。draconian：/dreˈkoniən/ adj.(法律、措施等)严厉的，残酷的 ...draconian measures to lower US healthcare costs. 削减美国医疗保健费用的严厉措施quarantine：/'kwɔrən'tin/ n. (人或动物生病之后被隔离的)检疫期Without it, China would by now have registered many millions of cases and tens of thousands of deaths. 虚拟语气的表达固定搭配：tens of thousands of 成千上万的 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });
